title: Build Configuration
description: Configuration for the LangChain Reference Docs IR build pipeline

path.description: Path to the package within the repository

entryPoints.description: Entry points for TypeScript extraction (relative to package path)

versioning.description: Version tracking configuration for this package

tagPattern.description: Git tag pattern for version discovery (e.g., '@langchain/core@*', 'v*')

maxVersions.description: Maximum number of minor/major versions to track

alwaysInclude.description: Version strings to always include regardless of maxVersions

enabled.description: Whether to enable version tracking for this package

pathOverrides.description: Version-specific path overrides (e.g., for v0.x with different directory structure)

descriptionSource.description: GitHub raw URL for custom markdown content, or 'readme' to use package README.md. If not specified, defaults to 'readme'.

subpages.description: Curated subpages for domain-specific symbol grouping. Array order determines navigation order.

slug.description: URL-safe slug for the subpage (lowercase, alphanumeric with dashes)

title.description: Display title for the subpage in navigation and page header

source.description: Path to markdown file (relative to repo root) or GitHub raw URL

excludePatterns.description: Patterns to exclude from extraction (e.g., '_internal' to skip internal modules)

packages.description: List of packages to extract from the repository
